subject: Other seller question.
message:

subject: Order not received.
message: My order status indicates shipping label was created, but canada post has not picked up. What is the delay?

subject: Question about delivery
message:
Hi Mike,
I know you previously placed an order and we didn't have an issues with the delivery. This package was return to us with an "invalid delivery address".
Can you please confirm if the address on file is correct.
I can also offer to ship to alternative address if you prefer.

subject: Order not received.
message:
Hi There,

Order #1024424704

My order was not received.  I received an email from Canada Post stating my package would be delivered on August 20, 2025.  I have received nothing to date. The tracking update keeps stating it will be arriving on the next business day.  I sent an email to Canada Post advising them it was not delivered on the 20th, as previously confirmed.  They replied stating they will continue to monitor.
How will you resolve this issue?

subject: Escalation Order not received. - PO 261156182 - CU 1024560944
message: Hi will I be able to get the laptop before Thursday.

subject: Order not received.
message:
Hello Seller, This is a representative from the Best Buy Canada Help Centre. A customers has reached out to us regarding this order, which has not been shipped for an extended period.

Could you please contact the customer directly to provide an update on the delivery status?

Thank you for your attention to this matter.
